ygData.subject: ring of the dead..?
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, upon turning the thex mallet into loveal, did i get a ring of the dead? no, i got a GODDAMN DEADEYE SCROLL! and to add injury to insult, invis to undead
ygData.messageBody:
ok, upon turning the thex mallet into loveal, did i get a ring of the
dead? no, i got a GODDAMN DEADEYE SCROLL! and to add injury to insult,
invis to undead wore off just as i was passing the ghouls on the way
out. argh.

another person i know of who turned in the thex mallet got a sword that
basically amounts to a bronze 2h. whupdedoo.

somebody please tell me its genuinely possible to get one of these damn
rings! or at least let me know the keyword to start the windstream
quest, since i am "too powerful" to start it myself ;p

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
